string.text: You hear me, you duck the stalker, or I'll nail you!
Blow my eyes out! And who's this here to see us?
Ow, ow, ow. What do I do? If I go to the money, I'll get money, if I don't go, I'll die for my life.
Valina's gone! Quickly!
Hey, what are you doing here? Get out of here while your legs are still intact!
Teml said to jump, you do it, there's more gloom in your pocket.
One more step! And he's dead!
We're on it!
I got your back!
Let's move out!
In position!
Position.
Hey, where are you going? Stop! Take it back, I said!
Meet me at the station!
I don't give a shit! I think we should get that artefact. For this money we hire men and attack the bandits with them.
You don't think they'll shoot him? As soon as the artefact is taken!
Man, you can't just go on and on! No matter how much you give, it's not enough!
I'm telling you, it's better to bring it as a ransom.
Not a fact! If there's gunfire, they'll shoot you for sure.
Okay, calm down, nobody's making a move, it's just that right now the only real option is to honour their terms.
I don't believe you.
Let's go! We've got to get out of here!
Thanks a lot, you got me out.
To all stalker sympathisers. Yanob Station has been attacked. All entrances and exits have been closed for some time.
Guns behind your back! This is neutral territory!
Guns behind your back! This is neutral territory!
We're in the middle of a firefight, mate, put the gun away, don't provoke.
We're already between lights, mate! Put the gun away, don't provoke!
Get it through your head! Weapons on the station! You're not going in!
Knock yourself out! Weapons on the station! You're not going in!
Subtitles by A. Semkin
Subtitles by A. Semkin
The sequel follows....
To all encounters and sympathisers, all is calm again in Baghdad, that is, in Janova. You're welcome to visit.
See you later, stalker!
That's it. You may.
Hello, Stalky!
What's your business?
Well, fair winds!
Have a safe journey!
Ah, hello, Maine.
Come on in, Man! Get some rest from the road!
Come on in, it can be fun!
POKEDALA!
Come on, brother, I've got everything like in Greece!
OLOHA!
That's it, the outburst is over. I hope everyone is well! If you're banged up, come to Janov. Gold!
So long! Don't be sick!
Bless you!
You look pale, maybe we should do it at Kolchik's.
You're like children. Another hole.
Anyone who can hear me, there's an emergency safe haven shield approaching.
Anyone who can hear me, the ejection is about to begin. I need you to find a safe place to run now.
So, after sealing the path, the wire was filled with gas.
Here's the entrance to the way wire. If we run the generator, we can open the transport gateway.
Wire path diagram to attach-one. Here's the proof. There is an underground way into the pripit.
Listen, you're lucky today, darling, only now I'm buying for dear, selling for cheap.
Hey, come here if you know how to bargain!
Well, show me what the zone has bestowed!
And we parted like ships at sea.
Ay, good boy! Ouch, I'll cheat! I'll be more careful with you now!
I'll tell you one thing, but don't take offence. Look, money's not everything, you know, right? Go on, dear.
No, it's not
Brrrr! What's that?
I'm... here.
Hi, it's me, Nitrogen. About the memory module. It's ready. You can have it.
What are you here for? I'm listening to you.
So here's the deal, we go together. You find fighters, send them to me, I'll make them into fighters team. Let me know when you've got it all worked out. Take the Mazot and go ahead, Upiter.
It's a quiet place if you don't ask questions of the locals.
It's quiet as a holiday resort!
Almost there!
Come on, get in here, the fun's about to begin!
Get over here! It's about to get interesting!
Well, what are you digging around for? You're gonna miss it?
Come on! What are you digging around for? You'll miss everything!
Where are you?! Come on, move it! It's about to get really bad!
Where are you? Come on, move it! It's about to get ugly in here!
That's it. Well, I can see you're itching to ask questions, but it's and it's understandable not to talk.
That's it. Well, I see you're getting a little tongue-tied. It's understandable that she wouldn't talk.
Oh, look, you got it! That's fine, the zombie kids have got our back. Get the bastards out!
Look, you've got it, get the bastards out of here!
Let's see if I was right or wrong, shall we?
Why would you do that? He touched you. He's a tough guy.
Well, why would you do that? He touched you. You're a tough guy, aren't you?
Hey, pare, how long have you been freezing? Anyway, we won't wait for you any longer. Squad, wrap it up!
Mum... Which one? What? It's me. I'm doing it again!
Ugh! Impossible! Sookie! My head! Oh, my head is splitting!
We'll be here to cover for you in case there's any trouble.
Oh, you fucker! Okay, we gotta get out of here, and we gotta get out of here fast!
Oh, fuck! Okay, we gotta get out of here, and we gotta get out of here fast!
Yeah, so you're the special panorama guy! Ha! All right, all right, don't worry, the guys are all smart and reliable the mutants will be dealt with quickly.
Well, everything seems to be calm, we can go.
It's all right. Okay, a few tushkans. It's already been sorted out.
I think it's the last one
I think it's the last one.
Oh, my God! I've got him! I've got him! Inside me!
Go, we'll cover the entrance!
Whoa! Locked!
Con-con-con-con-con-controller! Watch out!
Sultan, well, I'm pouring it out from the fiery thayer, for an hour you're revanate, I'm full, do you hear? Now the bitch will be remembered for a long time as the parivas' kid.
Hail to you, Sultans! Uflajni, Galimy!
Get away from these assholes. Khabarovka analysing behind Pulustank is enough for me for now. It's time to call it quits. They're probably looking for me by now. Well, we'll see who's who.
All right, get out of here. Debt only.
Gavrilenka, listen to me, I found out about the warehouse, it's the freedom fighters, a lot of them, so you take the whole squad, we'll smoke out the shitheads.
If the information checks out, you get access to the warehouse.
Hey, freedom of fucking freedom! The warehouse is debt territory, so get out while you're still in one piece!
Hey, freedom of fucking freedom! The warehouse is debt territory, so get out while you can!
Well, the labour's asking for it. Fighters, commence surgery!
Well, the labour's asking for it. Fighters, commence surgery!
Go somewhere else, it's a restricted area.
Flint, take your men, pull up, and go where the warehouse is. The debtors will be here any minute to pick up their stuff.
All right, now the boys are gonna fight back, that's right, I don't forget good deeds. You can use Tonjak as your own, I'll warn everyone.
Now, now, darling! We'll just fill the rucksacks with ammunition and then you'll understand!
Now, now, darling. We'll just fill the rucksacks with ammunition and then you'll realise.
Hey, it's St John's Wort. I just had a hunter come by. That's how he saw the chimeras last night. Judging by the description, that's the one. When you can, drop by my place. It's a big deal.
Okay, here we go. This is Janov station. The only safe place in the vicinity of Jupiter. This is where I'm leaving you. If you need me, look for me at the Bar.
Cheers!
BAY!
Ah, hello!
Howdy!

So this is your first time here? I'm a newcomer too, and my name is Zod, I'd like to meet you. I'm a techie, I fix what I want to fix? I'm a little short on tools, though. So if anything comes to hand, just get it over here. And if you need technical help, I'll be glad to see you on our Nadolgov half.
Let's go!
Everybody's ready. Open up!
Ready? Squad?
It's clear!
I'm ready, too.
Oh, I don't like this!
Always ready!
Ah! Fuck!
Bladys, let's go!
All right, you ready?
That's it! I don't belong here!
Good luck, boys!
No fluff!
So, no misfires?
Hey!
What's up, hunters?
And now, let's drink to the valiant expeditionary force of the Debt, designed to kick the arse of society's abandonment.

Didn't I tell you about Frintia? Oh, that's an interesting personality. For starters, he framed the stalker hunters for the a chimera attack. Then he left his partner to die in the anomaly, and there he was joined the ranks of freedom. Seems like the most logical development to me. So let's drink to more freedom fighters to follow his example. And we'll finish off the ones that are left.
I propose to drink to the fact that even in the centre of the zone there are people willing to serve the glorious cause for a long time. To our new squad, guys!
I'd like to raise my legally due that the science bunker is now secure. Us fighters for a long time. Now let mutants, anarchists and other scum try to get in.
Fighters, let's drink to our volunteers, this is a heroic men. For the benefit of national and world science, they conduct measuring in the most dangerous parts of the zone, kudos to them.
I propose a toast to the fighters long, who spared no life in repelling an attack by those filthy junkies on one of our facilities.
Absolutely!
Oh, that's right!
SAID IT WELL!
Here's to us!
He's already finished, you should be sent after him, so that you wouldn't be allowed to drag the zone to the big earth in pieces.
What was in there, no one knows! You sure you didn't hold a candle to that?

Is this the Monolithic unit? Ha ha ha ha, well guys, I hope you get the bloodsuckers under your banner soon. And from there, it'll be simple. We'll put you and the cop on the dangerous mutant list and burn you out. Indiscriminately, ha ha ha ha!
Found with the guards, forgotten how a year ago all over the dark running from mercenaries in the valley.

I can imagine the results the scientists will get. Air samples will be 100 per cent anaesthetic. Instead of water samples, diluted alcohol. And on the sound recording, your retarded laughter. Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!
It's okay, we'll get those guns back. You libertarians have a one-upmanship habit. When you meet our guys, you don't just give birth to hedgehogs, but you drop your guns, too.

Dudes, you hear that? Duty follows tradition. Here's Warrant Officer Morgan, for example, subordinating a tough the need to maintain the image. He was forced to get at the throat of your own crystal-clear nature and sell off half the stockpile.

Form up! Remember, the unshakable traditions of the Dolg were established by His Highness General Tachenka himself. He deceived his immediate subordinates, misled his commanders, and died valiantly in a space bubble. Every longshoreman should endeavour to follow his example.

You know, the first time I saw our new squad, I said, do you guys want a loan? You are free people after all, and we respect freedom of choice, don't we? Are they for me? No, they're all under orders. It's a lot of killing, and their eyes are empty. And we've had enough of the zombies, that's enough.

Have you heard the theme? A longshoreman comes up to one of ours who's a bunker guards and asks. Professor, which artefact is better in a fight with the Comanches? The one from the radiation? Or the eye that heals wounds? What about ours? Fasting, son, for recuperation. You'll be less out of breath by the time you get to your base.

People, do you know why the scientists chose our guys to do the anomaly measurements? They came to the shuga in the beginning, they say, you have to serve the cause of science. And he said, "That's easy. Who should be shot?
Folks, I'm becoming more convinced every day of the need for a long. I mean, just imagine who else would have amassed a whole warehouse of guns and gear, to sacrifice it for the cause of freedom?
Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!
Heh-heh-heh-heh-heh!
Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!
Hahahahahahahahahaha! Oooooooooooooooh!
Remember better, how your valiant squad knelt before us, when on Janov asked for before throwing out.
You see, mate, we've got one of those, and you've got one of those arseholes. Let's protect the world from the zone, shall we? Forgot to add just the prices of artefacts, we'll collect them first.
That's right! Fanatics to fanatics! You also have a monolithic form, because stalkers sometimes get confused, they take you for normal people.
Mutants, you say? Will you have enough room in the bunker when the mutants come? It's not like there's a Toringen bar in there. They didn't do shsa time there.
Well, if all you guys drink like you do, without a snack, I can only imagine what kind of results the scientists will get from you.
Yeah, and more guards, more guards in there. Half the zone already knows about your stockpile, so expect visitors!
Wait! You-- You find him!

You should have seen the artefacts I made the other day It's something, I'm telling you. Don't you know about the quarry? Well, there's not a shtick left in there. After Flintow, there's nothing to find on the Mali. Every old-timer knows that.

I'll tell you all about the bloodsuckers, I'll explain. As I was at Zaton's recently, everyone there was getting sick of those nipples. Stalker's brother poor bastard fucks with them day and night, and to make a it's not working. Result at zero. So I decided to help the guys out. I took a shotgun and went straight to the lair. Before the bloodsuckers come to visit. And for three days I gave them such a party, oh me! I've had to light two or three at once. Anyway, after my bloodsucker discos at the Zaton I'm not. They've picked up their feelers now.

I'll tell you how to take out the controllers. I'd recently acquired a bunch of artefacts, so I figured to discount them on the call. On the way back, I come to the stash. And there's a controller in there, and he's not going to leave. Here's Marro-ka on the spot, controller not controller, and I have to pick up the Habar, and I'm having an epiphany. If, I think, I close myself up with some kind of ironclad thing, I'm gonna have to do everything I don't give a shit about his antics, and knowing that I do. I take the metal grate that was lying around, and I use it so I'm just gonna close up on a quiet ramble. And so while I'm grazing, while I'm getting my brains wired, while I was wondering why I was so insensitive, I was already and he came close, and fell on my head. He's a hardy bastard, but I just threw the bars off, he's gonna kick my brains out, but I'm gonna hit him with the butt of my gun, he's quieted down right away.
Ha, that Eflin's got a point!
Ay Daflin, what a man!
Yeah, that's a good one!

They'll get messed up, but you'll know. What's not? Anyway, the conductors used to make a big detour, and I'm the one took the shortcut. Really just scratching my head. Hop one, two, there, courts. All the ciphers about getting through the anomalies quickly bought it back. I've sent it to the conductor. Not for nothing, obviously. So now he's putting everyone in my way.

About Azi, have you heard? Access to, have you heard. I was really there. First one to figure out how to get there. Well, there's no mutants, no anomalies. All is quiet, like my late grandmother's cottage. And the artefacts are like cucumbers, one on top of the other lying shovelfuls of mushrooms. Just the other day, I stopped by there for a little sunbathing. Spend it? Hmm, that's not even funny. And Azi, I'm sorry, is not rubber.

I've got all sorts of topics. Like working for scientists. You did, didn't you? Anyway, I stopped by his bunker one day. Well punched in, and something to see what they're up to. The professors were all shocked when they saw me. Well, they say you're just the kind of guy we need. Why do I ask? Turns out they've got to put their gadgets under the anomalies. These goggle-eyed men themselves don't want to go, of course? Well, they promised bobos and goodies and stuff. It's okay, I don't care. You were good. Well, then I had to crawl around the neighbourhood. Anomalies, monomalies. Well, that's okay. That's normal stalker bullshit. It was cooler later on when I started getting pledges out of professors.
It's fine!
Daaaaam!
WOW!

And if anyone thinks Flint's moving noodles he'll come up to anyone on base and ask who's who Flint. Some hunters came across it one day, and they went straight for it, Flint help me, oh, I can't do it without you. You know, we wanted to kill the chimera, but we had to show him the altitude of the flight. I went straight to the vlog of one just outside the entrance, as always set it up, herd when the chimera comes back to signal me, and he fell asleep in the morning and missed the chimera I got off my arse when I saw it, I had to do it myself to fight back, but I did, as you can see.
Everyone who can hear me, this is Herman. The science lab was attacked. Stalker recruitment has been temporarily terminated.
Everyone who can hear me, this is Herman. The science lab is ready to receive stalkers.
Silent_Subtitle
Subtitles by N. Novikov
Silent_Subtitle

Where do you go? You come back to the same spot every time. This bloody fog is impossible to get used to. Cheburneau disappeared her with a bang. That's weird. Did you find a way out? Day six. The water's all out. And the Colonel's gone mad. Shot two men and put a bullet in his own head. I'm alone now. Alone inside the fucking anomaly. I've already mined to cut off communication with HQ. You could have taken it, eh? Gensi, dacha, fishing. And there would be no debt. And really, I wonder how it would have turned out. Just for the hell of it. Captain Tachenko has been dead for a long time. General Dolg Tachenko is about to leave. Soon. Upper tundra hopeful. Places both rolls game. That's the justice of it.
Find a way out. We're asking for help. Honour the supplies.
Not anymore. Second day without water. We're asking for help. Ask for help. Sleep.
We need help now! We're gonna make it! 3 more at the most!
You shouldn't have come here, Stalker! Now you're dead!
Cut the wood, Stalker! Now you're dead!
Line up!
Form a line! Get in line!
Soldiers, congratulations on your joining the ranks of duty, listen to my command. Follow me, shagan, aj!
Here, you know how to do it when you want to. Well, we'll take the oath of office.
You swear to serve the cause long and faithfully, to protect humanity from zone aggression, and to always follow the charter.
So, any more questions?
Well, come on, sit down, let's chat!
We don't have a rigid hierarchy, we only go on a mission with someone we respect, but during team operations of our elders, we obey them without question.

We respect the freedom of our fighters and other stalkers. We believe that the zone is open to everyone and it is the greatest a gift to mankind. A chance to advance significantly in development. This is necessary - clearly recognised by everyone.
Well, welcome to freedom!
Who are we going to obey?
Hey, Stalker, come here, please!
Hey! Stalker! Come here! Please!
You can't sit still.
there's nothing but mutants around
Where to go?
We need to figure out where we are first.
We've got to find people!
We're screwed no matter what!
You'd better talk to the tramp.
You should probably see a tramp.
Not bad.
Let's get lazy!
That's great! That's it!
Let's wedge!
See you later!
Come back again!
Hello! Always happy to see a new person in our bunker!
Hello, hello!
Good luck to you!
Bye!
Hello!
Hi!
I dare not detain you.
You've got everything, then be well!
Ah, come here. What have you got?
Yeah, yeah, I'm listening.
Guys, let's pace ourselves. The sooner we finish, the safer we'll be.
Alpha, beta and gamma radiation levels measured.
Alpha beta and gamma radiation levels measured.
Measurement's up!
Samer's gone!
Torsion field scan complete.
Torsion field scan complete.
Just a little bit more! With torsional field measurements almost everything!
Just a little bit more! With the Terse Field measurement almost done!
Missing_Subtitle
Missing_Subtitle
Missing_Subtitle
Fuck, are you covering or what?
Come on, cover us!
Come on, cover us!
Hey, where'd you go?
Hey, where'd you go?
Hey, I'm not here! Help me out!
Hey, I'm not here! Help me out!
Where the fuck are you?
It's a fucking thing! Where are you?!
They're coming! Man, what the fuck?!
They're brutus! Man, what the fuck?!
Electromagnetic field scan is complete.
Electromagnetic field scan is complete.
The electromagnetic field is scanning!
The electromagnetic field is scanning!
Acoustic data for all bands are obtained.
Acoustic data for all bands are obtained.
Acoustic data are recorded for two bands.
Acoustic data are recorded for two bands.
Scat-4. Over. Come in. Come in. Scat-4. The Scat Group. Attention. This is Scud 1. An emergency situation has arisen. Evacuation of B-28. Repeat. -28.

Two bodies appear to have died on touchdown. Nothing of value was taken out. The on-board computer information has been deleted, but the black box survived. I think a proper technician could pull it out of him information.
Cheers!
Cheers!
BAY!
Ah, hello!
Howdy!
Howdy!
